name: BATTLETECH

task.description: Installing dotnet472 with winetricks. This will take several minutes.
task.name: winetricks

task.description: Installing CCCP (Combined Community Codec Pack) else cutscenes can't play and the game can't launch. Please follow the installer prompts to select "Full Installation".
task.name: wineexec

task.description: Please wait while the game installs. This will take several minutes.
task.name: wineexec

content:
files:
- goginstaller: N/A:Select the BATTLETECH setup file
- CCCP: http://www.cccp-project.net/public/Combined-Community-Codec-Pack-64bit-2015-10-18.exe
game:
  arch: win64
  args: -force-driver-type-warp
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/BATTLETECH/BattleTechLauncher.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: dotnet472
    arch: win64
    description: Installing dotnet472 with winetricks. This will take several minutes.
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Installing CCCP (Combined Community Codec Pack) else cutscenes can't
      play and the game can't launch. Please follow the installer prompts to select
      "Full Installation".
    executable: CCCP
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win64
    args: /LANG=en /SP- /SUPPRESSMSGBOXES
    description: Please wait while the game installs. This will take several minutes.
    executable: goginstaller
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
system:
  env:
    DXVK_HUD: 0
wine:
  dxvk: true
